name: Bar-I-Tone
description:
Catch and chug drinks to the beat!

BAR-I-TONE is a rhythm game that places you in charge of making sure three drunkards get their drinks in a nice, orderly fashion ... or else.

You can also play the game on Newgrounds for achievement integration!

ALSO THE GAME IS OPEN SOURCE, HERE'S THE CODE!

CREDITS:
